#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define FO(i,a,b) for (int i = (a); i < (b); i++)
#define sz(v) int(v.size())

using namespace std;

int h, w;

int main() {
    scanf("%d %d", &h, &w);
    int r = -1;
    FO(y,0,h) {
        int mn = 2e9;
        FO(x,0,w) {
            int t; scanf("%d", &t);
            mn = min(mn, t);
        }
        r = max(r, mn);
    }
    printf("%d\n", r);
}
